- now we use wood light to when you want
to make a polite request or an offer for
example
would you like to meet tomorrow now you
can even say can you meet tomorrow or
will you meet tomorrow but when you want
to be more polite or put in a polite

to know your opinion now I can even say
I want to know your opinion but again
when you want to be more polite you say
I would like to know your opinion so I
hope this is clear to you you use would

or coffee so they can even say can you
but when they say would you like to it's
just being more polite your again we use
like when you want to say something is
similar or typical now when you're
trying to link something or trying to
say something is similar to this it is
you use like to or when something is
very typical in terms of you know the

it's just like him to be late always so
it's at the better characteristic of my

in my next example he looks like a model

sorry you use like when you want to say
something is similar or typical to
something so now let's take a look at
feel like now we use feel like when you

vacation
I feel like going on a vacation now
friends please remember when you use
feel like the following verb what I mean
to say is not a verb actually you use a
gerund now a gerund is nothing but a
verb in the ing form like going coming
dancing okay and it is not a verb so
it's a gerund so feel like is always
mainly followed by adjourned now let's
take a look at the next example I don't

I desire I mean I don't want to study so
I don't desire to study so this isn't

please notice again feel like is
followed by a gerund
that is the ING verb or known as the
present participle okay now let's go on
to the next condition now we use like
when you want to replace it with
something that is said now please
remember this is just colloquially
but when you write something formally
you will not use like oh you're okay
for example I'm like where is your
